sub.subtitle: Product Listing and Filtering
bulletPoints: Users can filter products by category, subcategory, price range, and color.
Instant filtering using a debounce mechanism to prevent unnecessary API requests.
Products can be searched directly by name.

sub.subtitle: Shopping Cart Management
bulletPoints: The shopping cart syncs in real-time with the database.
Cart items are preserved even if the page is refreshed or closed.
Future updates will enable temporary stock reduction for added items.

sub.subtitle: User Account Management
bulletPoints: Users can register, log in, and update their account information.
Login authentication is required to access restricted pages like the Cart and Account pages.
